Pre-Game Insights: Iran were favorites heading into the match with Hong Kong after their impressive opening win.
Hong Kong had a tough start to the tournament but showed resilience in their previous match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the first Asian Cup finals game for Hong Kong since 1968.
Iran had a strong record in their World Championship Qualifiers against Hong Kong.
Others: The game was available to watch on Paramount+ in the US.
